rComments: Amy Rose is a very fair professor. She will not play favorites with her students and will grade fairly. She'll answer all your questions and give you great feedback on your work, so do take advantage of her office hours! If you're a linguistics major at UCSC, you should definitely take one of her classes.

I had Amy Rose previously for Syntax I and was very glad to take another class with her. She is a very gifted teacher. I've accomplished more in her classes than I thought I could, and she knows how to make any passing grade feel like a success. She was kind enough to ask my pronouns. If you want to be challenged and understood, she's the best.

Amy Rose is a wonderful professor. Her sarcasm and humor make the class fun, though sometimes come off as a tad intimidating. Go to her office hours and you'll know she's a great person. Very helpful, very down to earth, very, very smart. Take her class if you can!
Great teacher! Hardest subject and impecable amounts of hours studying and working. This professor makes time for students for critique on their progress and is blatantly honest and direct.
